Text.text: The context of the field 'Title Property' is the ObjectPage context which refers to 'RootEntity'. This entity set doesn't get any SideEffects but gets a PrepareAction and the messages are annotated. When the user presses Enter in this field, the PrepareAction is triggered and the property related to messages is requested from the back end. The back-end messages are added into the message view.
